scripts.preview: rm -rdf preview; mkdir -p preview; node scripts/preview.mjs
scripts.publish: rm -rdf dist; mkdir -p dist; node scripts/publish.mjs && git add . && git commit -m "published on `date`"; npm run publish:upload
scripts.publish:upload: aws s3 sync ./dist s3://myeflyn/knowledge/`git symbolic-ref --short HEAD`  --endpoint="https://nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com"  --acl public-read
